snippet.title: Discovery - PlayStation 4 Gameplay
snippet.description:
Explore a giant world made of blocks and modify it with your own creations. Construct houses, build entire villages, cities, monumental constructions or dig deep underground.
Place torches or design complex electric circuits to light up your creations in the dark and enjoy beautiful day and night cycles.
Build alone or together with friends in online multiplayer mode for up to 4 players.

Developed by Noowanda
Also released for PS Vita and Wii U

#theforeseenarcade #playstation #playstation4 #ps4 #psvr #discovery #discoveryps4 #minecraft #minecraftclone

FUN FACT: This is obviously a very, very, very, VERY barebones clone of Minecraft, which is already on PS4. The only thing going for it was the fact that it got PlayStation VR support before Mojang added it for their PS4 version.
